name: Manager
tagline: The idea is to create a website that helps you manage everything.Ideally a cloud based system that can replace a personal assistant.
body:
### Manager
Manager is an online system that when fully built can replace a personal assistant. Initial phase involve building an expense tracker,shopping checklist and a budget planner. Currently the project is simply in concept stage and more ideas, architecture etc will be added in future.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
